2134.subject: BUS
2134.descrlong: Provides a structured work experience in a resort hotel (for the hotel/resort emphasis) or in any type of hospitality-related organization (for the hospitality emphasis) that includes a minimum of 400 work hours. Students may transfer in a maximum of 200 hours of previously verified work experience. Provides an opportunity to learn directly on the job, complete a critical analysis and evaluation of the work, and participate in a management-related project. (Offered as interest warrants.)
